extDesc.message: Makes the Gmail webmail your default email application (original Google extension repackaged without toolbar button, with safer links and working 'copy address' option)

optGoogleApps.message: Enter the domain name of your Google Apps account:

optDomain.message: (Enter just the base domain your_domain.com instead of www.your_domain.com.

optConsumerGmail.message: For the consumer Gmail, leave the field empty.)

optDomainError.message:
Does not look like a valid domain - $1
Please re-enter
optDomainError.description: The user provided a wrong domain string
